alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Northern Columbia (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Columbia, northern Suwannee and central Hamilton Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 515 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Wellborn to Dowling Park. Movement was north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Live Oak, Jasper, Suwannee Springs, Suwannee River State Park, Dowling Park, Blue Springs, Newburn and Houston. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
